instructions:
Sear roast with shortening in a Dutch oven. Add all remaining above except brown gravy mix and carrots.
Cover and bake in 350-degree oven 3 1/2 hours or until tender *(check liquid occasionally)*. Add carrots about
15 minutes prior to serving. Finally, prepare the gravy mix using liquid from roast or water depending on
desired gravy thickness. 
*(Rev. 5/24/92)*
ingredients: 2 to 3 lb. chuck (sirloin tip or rolled rump) roast
1 can (10 oz) cream of mushroom soup
1/2 envelope Lipton dry onion soup mix
1 envelope McCormick brown gravy mix, prepared
name: Onion Mushroom Pot Roast
